languages.text: "Он не ваш, и никогда им ни был. Вы хотя бы раз читали собственный Патент? Каждое завоевание, каждая планета, что были завоеваны Вольным Торговцам, принадлежат Империуму — вам лишь надлежит быть вассалом. Но Вольные Торговцы не способны править эффективно — вами движет лишь жажда наживы и азарт. Бесконечный потенциал протектората растрачивается в руках избалованных болванов... Я устала смотреть на надругательство над устоями Империума. Не будь вас, и протекторат бы заработал на благо Империума словно священная машина Омниссии!"

"The protectorate isn't yours, and it never was. Have you not read your own Warrant, even once? Every conquest, every planet claimed by a Rogue Trader belongs to the Imperium — you are supposed to act as its vassal, nothing more. But Rogue Traders are incapable of efficient rule — all that drives you is your craving for profit and reckless exploits. The limitless potential of the protectorate is wasted in the hands of spoilt fools... And I am tired of watching you desecrate the very foundations of the Imperium. If it weren't for you, the protectorate would be operating for the good of the Throne as impeccably as a sacred machine of the Omnissiah!"
languages.original_text: "Он не ваш, и никогда им ни был. Вы хотя бы раз читали собственный Патент? Каждое завоевание, каждая планета, что были завоеваны Вольным Торговцам, принадлежат Империуму — вам лишь надлежит быть вассалом. Но Вольные Торговцы не способны править эффективно — вами движет лишь жажда наживы и азарт. Бесконечный потенциал протектората растрачивается в руках избалованных болванов... Я устала смотреть на надругательство над устоями Империума. Не будь вас, и протекторат бы заработал на благо Империума словно священная машина Омниссии!"

traits.locale_text: "The protectorate isn't yours, and it never was. Have you not read your own Warrant, not even once? Every conquest, every planet claimed by a Rogue Trader belongs to the Imperium — you are meant to act as its vassal, nothing more. But Rogue Traders are incapable of efficient rule — all that drives you is your craving for profit and reckless exploits. The protectorate's limitless potential is wasted in the hands of spoilt fools... I am tired of watching you desecrate the very foundations of the Imperium. If it weren't for you, the protectorate would be operating for the good of the Throne as infallibly as a sacred machine of the Omnissiah!"

languages.text: "Das Protektorat gehört nicht Euch und hat es auch nie. Habt Ihr Euren eigenen Handelsbrief nicht gelesen? Wenigstens einmal? Jede Eroberung, jeder Planet, den {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} beansprucht, gehört dem Imperium ... Ihr seid {mf|sein Vasall|seine Vasallin}, nichts weiter. Allerdings sind Freihändler unfähig zu herrschen ... alles, was Euch antreibt, ist Profitgier und Machthunger. Das grenzenlose Potenzial des Protektorats wird in den Händen verzogener Narren vergeudet ... Und ich bin es leid, mitanzusehen, wie Ihr das Fundament des Imperiums entweiht. Gäbe es Euch nicht, würde das Protektorat zum Wohle des Throns ebenso verlässlich arbeiten wie die heilige Maschine des Omnissiah!"
languages.original_text: "The protectorate isn't yours, and it never was. Have you not read your own Warrant, even once? languages.text: « Ce protectorat ne vous a jamais appartenu. N'avez-vous donc pas lu votre lettre de marque ? Toutes les conquêtes réalisées par un libre-marchand, toutes les planètes dont il prend le contrôle sont la propriété de l'Imperium. Vous êtes censés jouer le rôle de vassaux, rien de plus. Mais les libres-marchands sont incapables de gouverner efficacement, car ils sont uniquement motivés par la soif de profits et d'exploits inconsidérés. Le potentiel sans limites du protectorat est gâché entre les mains d'imbéciles trop gâtés... et j'en ai assez de vous voir bafouer les fondations mêmes de l'Imperium. Sans vous, le protectorat œuvrerait pour le bien du Trône aussi impeccablement qu'une machine sacrée de l'Omnimessie ! »
languages.original_text: "The protectorate isn't yours, and it never was. Have you not read your own Warrant, even once? Every conquest, every planet claimed by a Rogue Trader belongs to the Imperium — you are supposed to act as its vassal, nothing more. But Rogue Traders are incapable of efficient rule — all that drives you is your craving for profit and reckless exploits. The limitless potential of the protectorate is wasted in the hands of spoilt fools... And I am tired of watching you desecrate the very foundations of the Imperium. If it weren't for you, the protectorate would be operating for the good of the Throne as impeccably as a sacred machine of the Omnissiah!"

Sans vous, le protectorat œuvrerait pour le bien du Trône aussi impeccablement qu'une machine sacrée de l'Omnimessie ! »

languages.text: “你的王朝根本就不属于你，从来都不属于你。难道你从来没读过那份神圣授状的内容吗？行商浪人的每场征服，占领的每颗行星，都是帝国的神圣财产。你们仅仅是帝国的附庸，仅此而已。然而，行商浪人根本没办法有效管理自己的领地。你们所做的一切，都仅仅出于对利润的渴望，你们做事不计后果。这个王朝明明拥有无限的潜力，可那些被宠坏的白痴却把这一切都糟蹋了……我一直在看着你们亵渎帝国的根基，我已经受够了。只要没有你们，这个王朝就会像欧姆尼塞亚的神圣机械一样，无可挑剔地为黄金王座服务！”
languages.original_text: "The protectorate isn't yours, and it never was. Have you not read your own Warrant, even once? Every conquest, every planet claimed by a Rogue Trader belongs to the Imperium — you are supposed to act as its vassal, nothing more. But Rogue Traders are incapable of efficient rule — all that drives you is your craving for profit and reckless exploits. The limitless potential of the protectorate is wasted in the hands of spoilt fools... And I am tired of watching you desecrate the very foundations of the Imperium. If it weren't for you, the protectorate would be operating for the good of the Throne as impeccably as a sacred machine of the Omnissiah!"

languages.text: «El protectorado no es suyo. Nunca lo ha sido. ¿Es que no se ha leído la Patente ni por encima? Toda conquista, todo planeta con el que se hace un Comerciante Independiente, es parte del Imperium. Usted actúa como vasall{mf|o|a}, nada más. Pero ningún Comerciante Independiente sabe administrar las cosas de forma eficaz. Solo les guían las ansias de beneficio y la osadía. El incalculable potencial del protectorado se malgasta en manos de insensatos... y estoy harta de verles profanar las mismas bases del Imperium. De no ser por usted, ¡el protectorado trabajaría para mayor gloria del Trono con la misma eficacia que la maquinaria sagrada del Omnissiah!».
languages.original_text: "The protectorate isn't yours, and it never was. Have you not read your own Warrant, even once? Every conquest, every planet claimed by a Rogue Trader belongs to the Imperium — you are supposed to act as its vassal, nothing more. But Rogue Traders are incapable of efficient rule — all that drives you is your craving for profit and reckless exploits. The limitless potential of the protectorate is wasted in the hands of spoilt fools... And I am tired of watching you desecrate the very foundations of the Imperium. If it weren't for you, the protectorate would be operating for the good of the Throne as impeccably as a sacred machine of the Omnissiah!"

De no ser por usted, ¡el protectorado trabajaría para mayor gloria del Trono con la misma eficacia que la maquinaria sagrada del Omnissiah!».

languages.text: 「保護領は君のものではない。自分の令状を読んだことがないのか？ローグトレーダーが主張するすべての征服、すべての惑星は帝国のものだ。君はその家臣としての務めを果たすが期待されており、それ以上の権限はない。しかし、ローグトレーダーには効率的な統治は不可能だ。君を動かしているのは、利益への渇望と見境のない搾取だけだ。保護領の無限の可能性は、甘やかされた愚か者の手の中で無駄になる…そして、帝国の根幹を冒涜する君を見るのはうんざりだ。君さえいなければ、保護領は玉座の利益のために、万機神の神聖な機械のように非の打ちどころなく運営されていただろう！」
languages.original_text: "The protectorate isn't yours, and it never was. Have you not read your own Warrant, even once? Every conquest, every planet claimed by a Rogue Trader belongs to the Imperium — you are supposed to act as its vassal, nothing more. But Rogue Traders are incapable of efficient rule — all that drives you is your craving for profit and reckless exploits. The limitless potential of the protectorate is wasted in the hands of spoilt fools... And I am tired of watching you desecrate the very foundations of the Imperium. If it weren't for you, the protectorate would be operating for the good of the Throne as impeccably as a sacred machine of the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: 「保護領は君のものではない。自分の令状を読んだことがないのか？ローグトレーダーが主張するすべての征服、すべての惑星は帝国のものだ。君はその家臣としての務めを果たすが期待されており、それ以上の権限はない。しかし、ローグトレーダーには効率的な統治は不可能だ。君を動かしているのは、利益への渇望と見境のない搾取だけだ。保護領の無限の可能性は、甘やかされた愚か者の手の中で無駄になる…そして、帝国の根幹を冒涜する君を見るのはうんざりだ。君さえいなければ、保護領は玉座の利益のために、万機神の神聖な機械のように非の打ちどころなく運営されていただろう！」

languages.text: "Protektora size ait değil, hiçbir zaman da sizin olmadı. Ruhsatname'yi bir kez olsun okumadınız mı? Bir Hür Tacir'in gerçekleştirdiği her fetih, hak iddia ettiği her gezegen... İmparatorluk'a aittir. Sizin göreviniz, onun bir vasalı gibi hareket etmekten ibaret. Başka bir yetkiye sahip değilsiniz. Ancak Hür Tacirler, verimli bir yönetimden âcizdir. Sizi harekete geçirmeye iten tek şey, kâr hırsınız ve pervasızca sömürü arzunuz. Protektoranın sınırsız potansiyeli, şımarık aptalların elinde heba oluyor... Ayrıca İmparatorluk'un temellerine leke sürmenize artık dayanamıyorum. Siz olmasaydınız protektora, Taht'ın âli menfaatleri uğrunda tıpkı Hermesih'in kutsal bir makinesi gibi kusursuzca işlerdi!"
languages.original_text: "The protectorate isn't yours, and it never was. Have you not read your own Warrant, even once? Every conquest, every planet claimed by a Rogue Trader belongs to the Imperium — you are supposed to act as its vassal, nothing more. But Rogue Traders are incapable of efficient rule — all that drives you is your craving for profit and reckless exploits. The limitless potential of the protectorate is wasted in the hands of spoilt fools... And I am tired of watching you desecrate the very foundations of the Imperium. If it weren't for you, the protectorate would be operating for the good of the Throne as impeccably as a sacred machine of the Omnissiah!"

traits.locale_text: "Protektora size ait değil, hiçbir zaman da sizin olmadı. Kendi Ruhsatname'nizi bir kez olsun okumadınız mı? Bir Hür Tacir'in gerçekleştirdiği her fetih, hak iddia ettiği her gezegen İmparatorluk'a aittir. Sizin göreviniz onun bir vasalı gibi hareket etmekten ibaret. Başka bir yetkiye sahip değilsiniz. Ancak Hür Tacirler verimli bir yönetimden acizdir. Sizi harekete geçirmeye iten tek şey kâr hırsınız ve pervasızca sömürü arzunuz. Protektoranın sınırsız potansiyeli, şımarık aptalların elinde heba oluyor... Ayrıca, İmparatorluk'un temellerine leke sürmenize artık dayanamıyorum. Siz olmasaydınız protektora, Taht'ın âli menfaatleri uğrunda tıpkı Hermesih'in kutsal bir makinesi gibi kusursuz işleyecekti!"
